summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3384, for the improvement of 26th Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to the north line of Loyal Heights Addition, Division No. 6, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41991 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
